item.title: Report X-2024070888
item.description:
Report X-2024070888

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-15T18:15:54+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-05
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: LEAKER WAS CALLED INTO THE DMP AND DMP DISPATCHED A RESPONDER WITH FULL PPE AND SPILL CART. RESPONDER ARRIVED ON SCENE AND FOUND THE LEAKER. RESPONDER CONSULTED WITH THE DECSION TREE ON HOW TO PROCEED WITH THE SPILL. RESPONDER FOLLOWED THE GUIDLINES AND CLEANED UP THE SPILL USING APPRIATE PPE. RESPONDER BROUGHT LEAKER BACK TO THE DMP FOR PROPER DISPOSAL. LEAKER WAS PROPERLY DISPOSED OF.

  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: It was reported that 2-quarts of 10-minute drain opener gel spilled from a 2-quart plastic jug. The spill occurred inside the trailer. ERTS reviewed the SDS with the caller and they felt confident cleaning the spill with the available PPE onsite.
